噮字的基本解释

噮
yuàn
味美：“（黍）食之不噮而香。”

噮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuàn］
［《廣韻》烏縣切，去霰，影。］
过分甘甜。

噮字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噮； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页210第21
【廣韻】烏縣切【集韻】縈絹切，?音䬼。【玉篇】呂氏春秋云：伊尹曰：甘而不噮謂食甘。○按今《呂氏春秋》作甘而不噥。【廣韻】噮，甘不厭也。【集韻】噮噮，食甘甚也。【呂氏春秋】不噮而香。

噮字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
噮字的起名意思

暂无。

噮
Basic explanation of words
噮
yuàn
Tasty: "(Milk) food is not lingering but fragrant."
噮
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuàn］
["Guangyun" Wuxian cut, go to ha, shadow. ]
Too sweet.
噮
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　噮; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 210-21
[Guangyun] Wuxian Cut [Jiyun] Cut silk with yin,? Yin 䬼. [Jade articles] Lu's Chunqiu Yun: Yi Yin said: "Sweet but not sui" means food is sweet. ○According to today's "Lu Shi Chun Qiu", it is sweet but not choking. [Guang Yun] You don’t get tired of it. 【Jiyun】Shusu, the food is sweet. 【Lu Shi Chun Qiu】It is not silly but fragrant.
